events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at the intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision described.
Agent Smith was assigned to the case to assist the customer through the claims process.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured prompt action.
Request sent for customer's vehicle registration, photos of damage, and police report for verification.
Customer submitted all requested documents including photos and official police report within the deadline.
Investigation team has started reviewing the provided evidence and assessing the collision circumstances.
The investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault for the accident and damage is covered.
A settlement amount for vehicle repair has been proposed and sent to the customer for review.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
Final approval was granted by the claims manager based on investigation and customer agreement.
Insurance payment for the vehicle repairs was processed and issued to the customer's account.
The case was officially closed after confirmation that the repairs were successfully completed.
